CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The Stille polycondensation reaction of donor unit 5 and acceptor units 18-21 was carried out under the catalyst of Pd(PPh 3 ) 4 in chlorobenzene solutions at 150 °C for 3 days that could afford the corresponding polymers as a dark green solid.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| donor unit 5 |
| acceptor units 18-21 |
| chlorobenzene solutions |
| dark green solid |
| Pd(PPh3)4 (as a catalyst) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| donor unit 5 |
| acceptor units 18-21 |
| chlorobenzene solutions |
| dark green solid |

(Note: Pd(PPh3)4 is a catalyst, not a material in this context.)
